title: Balrug
data:
{{version028}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
[[Balrug]]s are brutish [[tier-2 demon]]s, often armed with [[brand]]ed [[demon whip]]s and capable of casting powerful [[Fire Magic]]. Even when unarmed, they still deal significant fire damage (14-27 HP) per hit.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*The more [[fire resistance]] you have when facing them, the better.
*Balrugs are vulnerable to [[cold]]. Any decent [[Ice Elementalist]] or [[Conjurer]] shouldn't have much difficulty with them. Other characters can take advantage of their vulnerability with [[freezing]]-branded weapons or by zapping them with a [[wand of iceblast]].
*Don't let their size fool you; balrugs are still faster than most characters.
*[[Maces & Flails]] specialists will probably want to take a look at their weaponry, as [[demon whip]]s are among the best weapons in the game.

==Trivia==
Balrugs are almost identical to the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Balrog balrog], a fiery whip-wielding demon from J.R.R. Tolkien's ''Lord of the Rings'' novels.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.28]], balrugs were [[:Category:Water_vulnerability|vulnerable to water]].
*Prior to [[0.10]], they were tier-1 demons.
*Balrugs knew Teleport Self between [[0.6]] and [[0.10]].
